nodes.text: Rruurrfhurra was a Wookiee firefighter from Rwookrrorro, on Kashyyyk. During the Clone Wars, Rruurrfhurra served as coordinator of the firefighters in his home city.
In the course of investigating a fire in the office of Turren Lonarr, Rruurrfhurra was shot dead. He had gotten too close to uncovering Lonarr's work bringing in Trandoshan hunters to Kashyyyk.
